roles.name: Data Entry Cell
roles.description: Enters Initial Case data as per the petition copy and updates case data as per the notice/interim order copy

roles.name: Reviewing Officer
roles.description: Reviewing details of case and send to appointing officer for appointment of OIC process

roles.name: Officer in Charge (OIC)Appointer -
roles.description: Appoints Officer in Charge from District/State as per the need of the case for managing Affidavit/Judgement

roles.name: Officer in Charge Approver
roles.description: Approves the Officer in Charge appointed

roles.name: Officer In Charge (OIC) -
roles.description: Manages the Case in terms of preparing Statement of Facts and submitting Affidavits in Court and managing Judgment related tasks

roles.name: Monitoring Officer
roles.description: Governance and Monitoring :To monitor Status of cases

roles.name: HRMS ADMIN
roles.description: HRMS Administrator which can create new employees

roles.name: Super User
roles.description: System Administrator. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.

roles.name: State Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that as access over a state

roles.name: National Dashboard Admin
roles.description: Admin role that as access over a Nation
